![doomed.jpg](https://i1.wp.com/www.onemanandhisblog.com/content/images/2008/05/doomed.jpg?resize=89%2C173)
An e-mail arrives from one [Private Fraser](http://privatefraser.wordpress.com/) of the Home Blogging Guard:
> TheOpsMgr’s DivestmentWatch blog has been taken down, seemingly at the [behest of RBI management](https://www.blogger.com/comment.g?blogID=29360049&postID=2425095672188781952&pli=1). >   > I’ve written about it and posted [the cached copy](http://privatefraser.wordpress.com/divestment-watch/) > > And so he has.
